section.name: Component Folder Names
section.description: This section contains the names of all the folders used for processing USFM TeX components.

folder.name: Illustrations Folder Name
folder.description: The name of the folder that all project Illustrations will be kept.

folder.name: Source Text Folder Name
folder.description: The name of the folder that all source text will be kept. Contents can be linked or hard copied into the project.

folder.name: Text Folder Name
folder.description: The name of the folder that the working text is stored in.

folder.name: Deliverables Folder Name
folder.description: The name of the folder that all project deliverables will be kept.

section.name: Processes
section.description: This section describes processes that are applied to component files.

section.name: Dependents
section.description: Files used in a Scripture component with their dependencies.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The final file that is the results of the rendering process.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The master contol file that funnels to the XeTeX rendering engine all the information necessary to render this component.

file.name: custom
file.description: The custom contol file that feeds into the the component control file.

file.name: group
file.description: The group contol file that feeds into the the component control file.

file.name: global
file.description: The global contol file that feeds into the the component control file. This is part of the bookTex control object.

file.name: usfmCompTex
file.description: This is the main TeX component processing macro file.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The component style file that feeds into the the component control file. These styles will override any previous styles that are set in dependent style files.

file.name: group
file.description: The group style file that feeds into the the group control file. These styles will override styles that are set in the global style file.

file.name: global
file.description: The global style file that feeds into the the group control file. These styles are the top level component styles and are the default for all components of this type.

file.name: .usfmCompTex
file.description: The TeX Scripture component configuration file that is created by the system from the TeX Scripture component type XML file.

file.name: usfmCompTex
file.description: The TeX Scripture component master XML file that is created to be used by the system.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The working text file that will be rendered. It is created by pre and post processes run on the source text.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The source text for this Scripture component.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: This file contains position and location information for illustrations used in this component.

file.name: captions.csv
file.description: This file contains illustration and caption information for all illustrations used in the publication.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: Component adjustment file which contains location information for where textual adjustments can be made.

file.name: [illustration]
file.description: Illustration files used by this component.

file.name: [process]
file.description: Reports made by various processes.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The parlocs file is created by XeTeX during the rendering process.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: This is the log file created by XeTeX during the rendering process.

file.name: [comp]
file.description: The delayed file is created by XeTeX during the rendering process.

file.name: tipe
file.description: This is the main log file that all the processes in the system feed into.
